text: @SkyNews The word NHS has almost dominated considerable chunks of Boris Johnson’s speech. Mindful that the NHS idea is a product of the late Aneurin Bevan, a celebrated Welsh man who was at once the Health Minister. In these Covid-19 times how would Bevan have reacted/responded?
